resources.string: Nagaon govt. boys high senior secondary school, Nagaon

Nagaon Govt. Boys\' H.S.School was established on 17th Nov.1865. It is a proud privilege for me to serve as a Principal of this esteemed institution. As Principal, my goal is to inspire staff, parents, and community to work together to provide education for all-round development of students. I look forward to the opportunity to empower our students to reach great success. It is a matter of pride for us that our staff have involved and successfully implemented a system for the educational development of our school. Keeping this in mind, our school family continues to remain committed to achieving both our vision and mission. And I am sure the school will reach a greater height in the years to come. We believe our educational app will provide necessary learning materials to students in a true manner.

Technomekanics was incorporated in 2019 by passion-driven techies who are willing to contribute to the society. We are specialist in the field of IoT & Electronics with an extensive team of competent research engineers and developers we are proficient in all domains related to the art of Robotics: AI & ML, IoT and software development. To do so we are providing a technical platform where one can get exposure to current industrial advancements, inbuilt their mindset, develop their ideas into reality, and create an impact.
